Integrated ChartDB database schema visualization tool into CTB branch.

Repository: https://github.com/djb258/chartdb.git

This branch now contains the full ChartDB codebase for database schema
visualization, ER diagrams, and DDL generation. The tool is accessible
via Composio MCP server at http://localhost:3001/tool

Capabilities:
- Database schema visualization
- Entity relationship diagrams
- DDL generation and export
- Schema comparison
- Database documentation

Updated configuration files to reflect CTB expansion from 15 to 18 branches.
